name: GetMobileDevicesTask
friendlyName: Get OpenText Functional Testing Lab Resources
description: Use this build step to retrieve resources from a Functional Testing Lab server
author: OpenText

inputs.name: mcServerUrl
inputs.label: Functional Testing Lab Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your Functional Testing Lab server, in the format http[s]://(server name):(port)

inputs.name: mcAuthType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the authentication mode to use for connecting to Functional Testing Lab

inputs.name: mcUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username that will access this Functional Testing Lab server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this Functional Testing Lab server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcAccessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Access Key will provide access to this Functional Testing Lab server during the build step run

inputs.name: useMcProxy
inputs.label: Use proxy settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to use a proxy for connecting to the Functional Testing Lab server

inputs.name: mcProxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your proxy server, in the format (proxy server name):(port)

inputs.name: useMcProxyCredentials
inputs.label: Use proxy credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to specify credentials for connecting to the proxy server

inputs.name: mcProxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username that will access this proxy server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcProxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this proxy server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcResources
inputs.label: Resources to retrieve
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose what resources will be retrieved from the Functional Testing Lab server

inputs.name: includeOfflineDevices
inputs.label: Include disconnected devices in response
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to include the disconnected devices within the list of devices retrieved by running this task
